<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">034dbba3d60f42107487b2169cc93fee</macroponent><name>your_contact_card/subHeadingBadges</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  const hasAdmin = api.context.session.user.roles.indexOf("admin") != -1;
  const subheadingBadges = [];
  if (hasAdmin) subheadingBadges.push({"label":"System Admin","color":"positive"});
	return subheadingBadges;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>reece.poulsen</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-08 18:33:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>d747d49f83778610b3fb7230feaad3cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>your_contact_card/subHeadingBadges</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BAM - You & I Builder Live!
